sources.title: The Last Indian (1938)
sources.description: As the White man takes more and more land from the American Indian, they diminish in number to one, who is pushed to madness. He steals a car and a wild live-action ride ends in a crash. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-last-indian-1938/

metadata.Plot: As the White man takes more and more land from the American Indian, they diminish in number to one, who is pushed to madness. He steals a car and a wild live-action ride ends in a crash.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
